alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Lake County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 4:15PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A couple of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lake County through 445 PM PDT... At 414 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Adel, or 22 miles east of Lakeview, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Adel and Warner Wetlands. This includes Warner Highway 140 in Oregon between mile markers 15 and 37. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
